languages.text: {n}Высокий сгорбленный {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g} пристально взирает на вас. Его изможденное лицо скрыто дыхательной маской, кожа рук имеет нездорово серый цвет, а {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугменты{/g} несут следы боевых повреждений и покрыты черным хромом, что придает его облику замогильную мрачность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Высокий сгорбленный {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g} пристально взирает на вас. Его изможденное лицо имеет нездорово серый цвет, а {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугменты{/g} несут следы боевых повреждений и покрыты черным хромом, что придает его облику замогильную мрачность.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: {n}The tall, hunched {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} stares at you unblinkingly. A breathing mask conceals his gaunt features, the skin on his hands is of a sickly grey hue, while his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий сгорбленный {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрец{/g} пристально взирает на вас. Его изможденное лицо скрыто дыхательной маской, кожа рук имеет нездорово серый цвет, а {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугменты{/g} несут следы боевых повреждений и покрыты черным хромом, что придает его облику замогильную мрачность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The tall, hunched Tech-Priest stares at you unblinkingly. His gaunt face is a sickly grey hue, while his augments show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's pale face is a still mask of fake servility. The bright blue eyes seem to be looking through you. Hundreds of thin, metal braided wires and cords of all colors wrap around the head, hands, and neck, disappearing into the humble dark gray raiment.{/n} "Commencing identification."
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

traits.locale_text: {n}The tall, hunched Tech-Priest stares at you unblinkingly. His gaunt face is a sickly grey hue, while his augments show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}

Hundreds of thin braided metal wires and cords of all colours wrap around his head, hands, and neck, disappearing into the humble dark grey raiment.{/n} "Commencing identification."

A breathing mask conceals his gaunt features, the skin on his hands is of a sickly grey hue, while his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The tall, hunched {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} stares at you unblinkingly. A breathing mask conceals his gaunt features, the skin on his hands is of a sickly grey hue, while his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: {n}長身で背中を丸めた{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}が、まばたきもせずこちらを見つめている。呼吸マスクが男のやつれた顔を隠し、手の皮膚は病気のように灰色だ。{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメント{/g}には戦いを思わせる傷があり、黒いクロムメッキで覆われていて、どことなく憂鬱とした雰囲気が漂っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, hunched {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} stares at you unblinkingly. A breathing mask conceals his gaunt features, the skin on his hands is of a sickly grey hue, while his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}背が高く、背中を丸めた{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}が、まばたきもせずこちらを見つめている。痩せこけた顔は病的な灰色で、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメント{/g}は戦闘による損傷の跡があり、黒いクロムメッキで覆われていて、どことなく憂鬱とした雰囲気が漂っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: {n}这位高大、驼背的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}目不转睛地盯着你。他憔悴的脸上罩着一个呼吸面罩，双手的皮肤呈现出病态的灰色。他的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}带着战斗留下的损伤，表面镀了一层黑色的铬，这让他带着某种忧郁的气质。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, hunched {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} stares at you unblinkingly. A breathing mask conceals his gaunt features, the skin on his hands is of a sickly grey hue, while his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位高大、驼背的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}目不转睛地盯着你，憔悴的脸上呈现出病态的灰色。他的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}带着战斗留下的损伤，表面镀了一层黑色的铬，这让他带着某种忧郁的气质。{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: {n}El alto y encorvado {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} te mira sin pestañear. Una máscara respiratoria oculta su rostro demacrado y la piel de sus manos presenta un tono gris enfermizo, mientras que sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} muestran signos de daños en combate y están chapados en cromo negro, lo que le confiere una sensación general de hosquedad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, hunched {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} stares at you unblinkingly. A breathing mask conceals his gaunt features, the skin on his hands is of a sickly grey hue, while his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El alto y encorvado {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} te mira sin pestañear. Su rostro demacrado presenta un tono gris raquítico, mientras que sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} muestran signos de daños en combate y están chapados en cromo negro, lo que le confieren una sensación general de hosquedad.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: {n}Le grand {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} voûté vous regarde fixement sans ciller. Un masque respiratoire dissimule son visage émacié, la peau de ses mains est d'un gris maladif et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} plaquées de chrome noir, endommagées au combat, lui donnent un air lugubre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, hunched {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} stares at you unblinkingly. A breathing mask conceals his gaunt features, the skin on his hands is of a sickly grey hue, while his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le grand {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} voûté vous regarde fixement sans ciller. Son visage émacié est d'un gris maladif, tandis que ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} plaquées de chrome noir portent les marques de dégâts subis au combat et lui donnent un air lugubre.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: {n}Der große, gebückte {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} starrt dich an, ohne zu blinzeln. Eine Atemmaske verbirgt sein hageres Gesicht, die Haut seiner Hände hat einen kränklich grauen Farbton, seine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} weisen Kampfschäden auf und sind mit schwarzem Chrom geschützt, was seinem ganzen Auftreten einen Hauch von Traurigkeit verleiht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, hunched {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} stares at you unblinkingly. A breathing mask conceals his gaunt features, the skin on his hands is of a sickly grey hue, while his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der große, gebückte {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} starrt dich an, ohne zu blinzeln. Sein hageres Gesicht hat einen kränklich grauen Farbton, seine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} weisen Kampfbeschädigungen auf und sind mit schwarzem Chrom geschützt, was seinem ganzen Auftreten irgendwie einen Hauch von Traurigkeit verleiht.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest

languages.text: {n}Uzun boylu ve kambur {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, gözlerini kırpmadan sana bakıyor. Solunum maskesi, sıska yüz hatlarını gizliyor. Ellerindeki derinin rengi, hastalıklı bir griye çalıyor; siyah kromla kaplı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentleriyse{/g} çatışmalardan kalma hasarlarla dolu ve ona kasvetli bir hava katıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall, hunched {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} stares at you unblinkingly. A breathing mask conceals his gaunt features, the skin on his hands is of a sickly grey hue, while his {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} show signs of combat damage and are plated in black chromium, giving him a general air of lugubriousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Uzun boylu ve kambur {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, gözlerini kırpmadan sana bakıyor. Solunum maskesi zayıf yüzünü gizliyor. Ellerindeki derinin rengi hastalıklı bir griye çalıyor, siyah kromla kaplı {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogment{/g}leriyse çatışmalardan kalma hasarlarla dolu ve ona kasvetli bir hava katıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22_TechPriest
